name: e2e-tests
description: For running end to end tests we use testcafe (https://testcafe.io/) along with its official electron plugin (https://github.com/DevExpress/testcafe-browser-provider-electron)

scripts.test:build: lerna run distUbuntu --scope quiet --stream && npm run test:create && npm run test:join
scripts.test:dev: npm run build:app && npm run test
scripts.test:create: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2eCreate E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='waggle*,nectar*,e2e*,frontend*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe "electron:../frontend" "./**/newUser.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:join: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2eJoin E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='waggle*,nectar*,e2e*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe "electron:../frontend" "./**/joiningUser.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2e E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='waggle*,nectar*,e2e*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe "electron:." "./**/smokeTest.e2e.ts"
